level.text: Any organization which meets the requirements set forth in this chapter for a license may apply to co-sponsor a bingo operation, a raffle or a Monte Carlo night party.

Co-sponsors shall conduct bingo operations, raffles and Monte Carlo night parties under a single license with the same member-in-charge, deputy member-in-charge, and person responsible for gross receipts, and pay a single license fee and file a single financial report pursuant to §§1413, 1508 and 1610 of this title
All agreements between co-sponsoring organizations applying to the Board for a license shall be reduced to a written contract.
All contracts between co-sponsors shall be submitted to the Board with the application for a license and shall include the following information:
Percentage of the handle each co-sponsor shall receive from the bingo operations, raffles or Monte Carlo night parties;
Terms of discount, if any, in raffle ticket prices; and
